histogram.name: QuickStart.AttestationCertificate.FailureReason
histogram.summary: Failure reason of attempted Remote Attestation certificate fetch. Recorded when we receive a response from ChromeOS platform (e.g. when the device itself cannot support attestation) or Google's Privacy CA.

histogram.name: QuickStart.AttestationCertificate.FetchDuration
histogram.summary: Time elapsed from attempting to fetch a Remote Attestation certificate to receiving a certificate or an error. It is recorded when an attestation certificate request finishes.

histogram.name: QuickStart.AttestationCertificate.FetchResult
histogram.summary: Records the overall success / failure result of fetching a Remote Attestation certificate. Recorded when we receive a response from ChromeOS platform (e.g. when the device itself cannot support attestation) or Google's Privacy CA.

histogram.name: QuickStart.AuthenticationMethod
histogram.summary: The method used to authenticate connection with source device. Recorded when the connection is marked authenticated.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ChallengeBytes.FailureReason
histogram.summary: Records the (failure) reason of fetching challenge bytes from Gaia. Recorded when we get a response from Gaia (or the request times out) - regardless of the overall status of the response. Successful requests are logged in the `NONE` enum bucket.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ChallengeBytes.FetchDuration
histogram.summary: Time elapsed from attempting to fetch challenge bytes (from Gaia) to receiving challenge bytes or an error. It is recorded when the request for challenge bytes finishes (or times out).

histogram.name: QuickStart.ChallengeBytes.FetchResult
histogram.summary: Records the overall success / failure result of fetching challenge bytes from Gaia. These challenge bytes are later used to generate a FIDO assertion and a Remote Attestation certificate. Recorded when we get a response from Gaia (or the request times out).

histogram.name: QuickStart.ConsumerUpdateCancelled
histogram.summary: Records the total number of cancelled Consumer Updates during an ongoing Quick Start session. Recorded when a user cancels after an update starts downloading.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ConsumerUpdateStarted
histogram.summary: Records the total number of Consumer Updates during an ongoing Quick Start session. Recorded when the update starts downloading.

histogram.name: QuickStart.EntryPoint
histogram.summary: The entry point from which the Quick Start flow is initiated. Recorded when transitioning to the Quick Start screen at the beginning of a session.

histogram.name: QuickStart.EntryPointVisible
histogram.summary: Counts number of times a Quick Start entry point button is visible. Emitted when the button visibility is determined.

histogram.name: QuickStart.FastPairAdvertisementEnded.Duration
histogram.summary:
Time elapsed from attempting to start Fast Pair Advertising to it ending. Recorded after unregistering the advertisement. It is not recorded when an error occurs attempting to register/unregister the advertisement.
Note: buckets were resized during m126 to increase max duration.

histogram.name: QuickStart.FastPairAdvertisementEnded.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: Reason a Fast Pair BLE advertisment failed to unregister. Recorded whenever a Bluetooth Advertisement error occurs after attempting to unregister the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.FastPairAdvertisementEnded.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Whether unregistering the Fast Pair advertisement was successful. Recorded after unregistering the advertisement or when there's an error attempting to unregister the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.FastPairAdvertisementStarted.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: Reason a Fast Pair BLE advertisment failed to register. Recorded whenever a Bluetooth Advertisement error occurs after attempting to register the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.FastPairAdvertisementStarted.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Whether Fast Pair advertising is started successfully. Recorded after the advertisement is succesfully registered or when there's an error attempting to register the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.FlowAborted.Reason
histogram.summary: The reason why the Quick Start flow is aborted. Recorded when flow aborts.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ForcedUpdateStarted
histogram.summary: Records the total number of Forced Updates during an ongoing Quick Start session. Recorded when the update starts downloading.

histogram.name: QuickStart.GaiaAuthentication.Duration
histogram.summary: Time elapsed from attempting a Gaia authentication to receiving a response. It is recorded when the `startsession` request finishes.

histogram.name: QuickStart.GaiaAuthentication.Result
histogram.summary: Records the result of attempting a Gaia sign-in. Recorded when we try to sign the user in by fetching an OAuth authorization code - in exchange for a FIDO assertion and a Remote Attestation certificate.

histogram.name: QuickStart.GaiaTransferResult
histogram.summary: Whether Gaia transfer was successful. Recorded after succesfully completing account creation or when an error occurs during account transfer process.

histogram.name: QuickStart.GaiaTransferResult.FailureReason
histogram.summary: The reason Gaia account transfer attempt failed. Recorded when an error occurs receiving an assertion response.

histogram.name: QuickStart.HandshakeResult.Duration
histogram.summary: Duration of handshake message sent till a response being verified. Recorded when a response is received.

histogram.name: QuickStart.HandshakeResult.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: The error code associated with failing to successfully verify the handshake response. Recorded when a response is received.

histogram.name: QuickStart.HandshakeResult.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Whether handshake response was parsed and verified. Recorded when receiving a handshake response.

histogram.name: QuickStart.HandshakeStarted
histogram.summary: Whether handshake was attempted to authenticate connection. Handshake is attempted when an incoming connection is accepted and using QR code authentication. Recorded when an incoming connection is accepted.

histogram.name: QuickStart.MessageReceived.DesiredMessageType
histogram.summary: The message type that should be received from the remote device. Recorded when the response is received or a timeout occurs waiting for it.

histogram.name: QuickStart.MessageReceived.{MessageType}.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: The type of error that occured when receiving a message. Recorded when the response is received or a timeout occurs waiting.

histogram.name: QuickStart.MessageReceived.{MessageType}.ListenDuration
histogram.summary: The listen duration waiting for a response from the remote device. Recorded when succesfully receiving a response or when a timeout occurs waiting for a response.

histogram.name: QuickStart.MessageReceived.{MessageType}.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Whether the target device received message from the remote device. Recorded when a response is received or when a timeout occurs waiting for a response.

histogram.name: QuickStart.MessageSent.MessageType
histogram.summary: The message type sent to the remote device. Recorded before writing stream of bytes.

histogram.name: QuickStart.NearbyConnectionsAdvertisementEnded.Duration
histogram.summary:
Time elapsed during Nearby Connections advertisement. Recorded after successfully stopping the advertisement. It is not recorded when an error occurs attempting to start/stop the advertisement.
Note: buckets were resized during m126 to increase max duration.

histogram.name: QuickStart.NearbyConnectionsAdvertisementEnded.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: Reason a Nearby Connections advertisement failed to stop. Recorded whenever a Nearby Connections error occurs after attempting to stop the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.NearbyConnectionsAdvertisementEnded.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Whether the Nearby Connections advertisement was successfully stopped. Recorded after the advertisement succesfully stops or an error occurs after attempting to stop the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.NearbyConnectionsAdvertisementStarted.ErrorCode
histogram.summary: Reason a Nearby Connections advertisement failed to start. Recorded whenever a Nearby Connections error occurs after attempting to start the advertisement.

histogram.name: QuickStart.NearbyConnectionsAdvertisementStarted.Succeeded
histogram.summary: Whether Nearby Connections advertising is started successfully. Recorded when advertising successfully starts or when an error occurs after attempting to start.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ScreenClosed.{ScreenName}.Reason
histogram.summary: The reason a screen is closed. This includes all major Quick Start screens as well as all other OOBE screens that occur in the middle of the Quick Start flow. Recorded when a screen is closed.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ScreenClosed.{ScreenName}.ViewDuration
histogram.summary: How long a user viewed a screen. This includes all major Quick Start screens as well as all other OOBE screens that occur in the middle of the Quick Start flow. Recorded when a screen is closed.

histogram.name: QuickStart.ScreenOpened
histogram.summary: The screen a user views as they go through the Quick Start flow. This includes all major Quick Start screens as well as all other OOBE screens that occur in the middle of the Quick Start flow. Recorded when the screen is shown.

histogram.name: QuickStart.SetupComplete
histogram.summary: When a user has successfully completed Quick Start. Recorded when the Quick Start Setup Complete screen is shown.

histogram.name: QuickStart.WelcomeScreen.QuickStartButtonVisible
histogram.summary: Whether the Quick Start entry point button is visible on the Welcome Screen. Emitted when the button visibility is determined. This metric is used for understanding which users had Quick Start already enabled before an update during finch experiment analysis.

histogram.name: QuickStart.WifiTransferResult
histogram.summary: Whether the Wifi credentials transfer was successful. Recorded when checking if Wifi credentials was received from source device.

histogram.name: QuickStart.WifiTransferResult.FailureReason
histogram.summary: Failure reason of attempted Wifi credentials transfer. Recorded when checking if Wifi credentials was received was source device.
